## 3. DESCRIPTION (Final Public Copy — Plain Text)
Rain falls softly outside as neon city lights glow through the window.
This 1-hour Lo-Fi and Synthwave mix blends cozy beats, warm analog textures, and gentle rain ambience to create a calm, immersive atmosphere for studying, relaxing, reading, coding, or late-night creative work.
Designed to stay smooth and consistent, this mix avoids sudden changes and distractions, making it ideal for focused listening.
All music is royalty free and safe to use in streams, videos, and content. Credit is appreciated but not required.
Best for:
- Studying and homework
- Deep focus and background work
- Coding and creative sessions
- Relaxing or winding down
- Cozy rainy-night listening
Vibe and aesthetic:
Rain on glass, neon city glow, CRT warmth, analog gear, soft static, calm nighttime energy
If rainy nights help you focus, this mix will feel right at home.
